column5: Just rolled thru the Ottawa Valley just now  Man Never in All my life have I heard continuous Thunder that has gone on for 20 minutes without a break  Not sure cause of these hills??? but wow  They say Quebec had a funnel cloud  Heads up
Yup, it was bad here....still very dark.
We got it yesterday. Unreal water in 2 hours. 20 kmh and I couldnt see a thing. Apparently,they got a good one in Bradford. The mrs,s said she had to pull over twice.
Think another band is comin your way Roy

Was over in Newmarket yesterday afternoon, the temperature dropped from 28 to 17 in less than 2 minutes, rain so hard I almost had to pull off the road. It only lasted a couple of minutes then it was back to blue sky.
I was going to get out the float gear and try a few drifts down the road besides my house.  It was ripping!  Sewers couldn't keep up.

Hit us hard in Ottawa west, the sky was incredible and then the lightning started, wow, The entire sky looked like a rolling light show. Then the rain lol, kinda cool, we shut the lights of and just watched. Only lasted about 25 min but it was intense!
